Detailed Description

template<class TBase>
class WTL::CButtonT< TBase >

A button class.

This class encapsulates the functionality of a Windows button, which usually is a small clickable rectangular control.

Definition at line 182 of file atlctrls.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class TBase>
WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::CButtonT (  HWND    hWnd = NULL )  [inline]
 

Constructor.

This constructor constructs a CButtonT object. Use the argument to assign a Button control right away. Use the Create method to create a new control.

Parameters:
hWnd  A Window handle. Can be NULL.

template<class TBase>
void WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::Click (    )  [inline]
 

Simulates a button click.

Simulates a button click by sending a BM_CLICK message to the button.

Definition at line 288 of file atlctrls.h.

template<class TBase>
HWND WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::Create (  HWND    hWndParent,
_U_RECT    rect = NULL,
LPCTSTR    szWindowName = NULL,
DWORD    dwStyle = 0,
DWORD    dwExStyle = 0,
_U_MENUorID    MenuOrID = 0U,
LPVOID    lpCreateParam = NULL
)  [inline]
 

Creates a new button.

Creates the Windows button control and attaches it to the CButtonT object.

Parameters:
hWndParent  A Window handle to the parent/owner.
rect  Specifies the button control size and position. It can be a CRect object or a RECT structure.
szWindowName  Contains the caption of the button.
dwStyle  Specifies the button control style. Apply any combination of button styles to the button.
dwExStyle  Extended Window style.
MenuOrID  Specifies the button control identifier.
lpCreateParam  Optional creation parameter.
Returns:
The window handle of the new button.

template<class TBase>
int WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::GetCheck (    )  const [inline]
 

Retrives the check state of the button.

This method retrieves the check state of a radio button or check box.

Returns:
Returns BST_UNCHECKED, BST_CHECKED or BST_INDETERMINATE if the button is a check/radio button.

template<class TBase>
void WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::SetButtonStyle (  UINT    nStyle,
BOOL    bRedraw = TRUE
)  [inline]
 

Sets the button style.

This method changes the style of a button.

Parameters:
nStyle  Specifies the button style.
bRedraw  Specifies whether to redraw the button. A nonzero value redraws the button. A zero value does not redraw the button. The button is redrawn by default.

Definition at line 232 of file atlctrls.h.

template<class TBase>
void WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::SetCheck (  int    nCheck )  [inline]
 

Sets the check state of the button.

This method sets or resets the check state of a radio button or check box, and has no effect on a push button.

Parameters:
nCheck  Specifies the check state. See GetCheck for values.

Definition at line 270 of file atlctrls.h.

template<class TBase>
void WTL::CButtonT< TBase >::SetState (  BOOL    bHighlight )  [inline]
 

Sets the button state.

This method sets the highlighting state of a button control.

Parameters:
bHighlight  Specifies whether to highlight the button. A nonzero value highlights the button; a zero value removes any highlighting.
Remarks:
Highlighting affects the exterior of a button control. It has no effect on the check state of a radio button or check box. A button control is highlighted when the user clicks and holds the left mouse button. The highlighting is removed when the user releases the mouse button.
